title: Fleet Entity Schema
description: Fleet entity definition - extracted from game-state.json for context window optimization. See schemas/formats.json for format specifications.

id.description: Unique fleet identifier in format 'type-index' (e.g., '9-11' for fleet type 9, index 11). Type 9 = Fleet.

owner.description: Player ID who owns this fleet. Format: 'type-index' (e.g., '1-11' for player type 1, index 11). Type 1 = Player.

planetId.description: Planet ID where fleet is located, empty string if away. Format: 'type-index' (e.g., '2-1' for planet type 2, index 1). Type 2 = Planet.

status.description: Fleet status: 'onStation' = at planet (can build), 'away' = away from planet (cannot build)

items.description: Struct identifier in format 'type-index' (e.g., '5-42' for struct type 5, index 42). Type 5 = Struct.

structs:statusValues.onStation: Fleet at planet, can build on planets
structs:statusValues.away: Fleet away from planet, cannot build on planets

structs:verification.note: API response schema. Status values verified. For code-based field definitions with movement requirements, see schemas/entities.json#/definitions/Fleet
